name: iOWN
description: iOWN is a Blockchain-based Investment Platform launched to bridge the gaps between Investors and Businesses seeking funding. iOWN Platform is a marketplace where users can choose from the various investment options listed on the platform. The users will be able to use the iOWN Tokens to access the aforementioned service offering of the iOWN Platform and benefit from other services. The iOWN Platform shall provide its users information and details about the various investment opportunities including business location, domain, and expected ROI.
